title: Revealed: Govinda’s look from ‘Jagga Jasoos’
Preity, Iulia attend 'Tubelight' screening
description: Salman Khan hosted a special screening of his film 'Tubelight' for family and a few close friends on Thursday evening. The actor invited a selected to few to join him watch the film before its worldwide release on Friday.

title: Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra will reunite for ‘Aashiqui 3’
Shah Rukh Khan's ‘Tubelight’ cameo leaked online
SRK watches 'Tubelight with daughter Suhana
description: Bollywood’s Badshah Shah Rukh Khan was among the first few celebrities to catch a screening at a multiplex in Mumbai.

title: Movie Review: Tubelight
description: Salman laughs and cries unselfconsciously, unraveling the lesser-seen side of his macho image. He cannot move mountains with his performance but he manages to keep the faith alive. Sohail is sincere. Zhu Zhu shows spunk and young Matin entertains. And, Om Puri reminds you of the mettle unsung heroes are made of.

title: Pic: Aishwarya-Aaradhya’s play date in London
Ishaan Khatter shoots 64 takes in muck for Majid Majidi's film
description: We all know how Shahid Kapoor puts his heart and soul into his characters and it seems sibling Ishaan Khatter is no different.

title: Watch: 'Tubelight' star Matin Rey Tangu’s audition footage
description: The little ‘Tubelight’ star Matin Rey Tangu, is rising high on popularity charts, just as Salman Khan’s former 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' co-star Harshali Malhotra.

title: Pics: Mira Rajput spotted on a day out with daughter Misha
description: You just can't take your eyes off these cute pictures of Shahid Kapoor-Mira Rajput's daughter Misha.

title: Pic: Sara Ali Khan’s resemblance with Amrita
Arjun Kapoor goes in flashback mode, shares '90s childhood click
description: If not sharing pictures of himself living it up with his B-town besties, Arjun often shares adorable yellowed pictures from his cherished childhood years.

title: WATCH: 'Mubarakan' title track
description: Two days after the release of the highly-anticipated trailer of Arjun Kapoor's next 'Mubarakan', the makers dropped the title track on social media today evening.

title: Sridevi would prefer to see Jhanvi married?
description: Superstar Sridevi entered films at a tender age of four and has now completed 50 years in cinema with 300 films to her credit.

title: TV actress Mouni Roy to debut with Akshay's 'Gold'
description: Television actress Mouni Roy, who is well-known for her part in the popular show 'Naagin', is now ready for her big screen debut. Mouni, who had previously made a cameo in Anubhav Sinha's 'Tum Bin 2', is all set to play an important role in the Akshay Kumar starrer 'Gold', which is being directed by Reema Kagti.

title: Salman-Arbaaz start working on ‘Dabanng 3’?
John Abraham launches first poster of 'Parmanu: The story of Pokhran'
description: John Abraham has unveiled the first poster for his next film titled ' Parmanu: The story of Pokhran'.

title: Shah Rukh Khan’s rendezvous with Sejals in Ahmedabad
description: It was a ‘Sejalicious’ Wednesday for Shah Rukh Khan in Ahmedabad, which will now be known as the city with the most number of girls named Sejal.

title: Don't endorse GST, Congress urges Amitabh Bachchan
description: The Congress' Mumbai unit on Wednesday asked megastar Amitabh Bachchan to refrain from acting as the Brand Ambassador for the upcoming Goods & Services Tax (GST) being rolled out from July 1.
